about_the_game:
Rogue Tanks is a top-down roguelike tank combat game with support for 1 to 4 players.

Co-op Campaign

Defeat every enemy in 20 randomly selected rooms from a list of 54 hand-crafted levels. After defeating every enemy in a room, choose an upgrade to make your tank faster and stronger. Supports 1 to 4 players locally. Defeat special bosses like the 4-directional, lob-shot, and homing missile tanks to unlock them to play as. Clear special challenge rooms and complete other missions in each run of the game.

Full Game Features

  • 54 total levels for the campaign and versus modes

  • 35 skins to customize the look of your tank

  • 4 different tanks that each fires differently

  • 4 different environments: desert, forest, metal, and space

  • Campaign mode for 1 - 4 players

  • Survivor mode for 1 - 4 players

  • Battle mode for 2 - 4 players

  • Race mode for 2 - 4 players

  • turn on/off friendly fire to force more or less cooperation

  • turn on/off timer to practice speedrunning

  • saves various records and statistics for each tank type

  • 36 missions to complete

  • All game modes support up to 4 players locally

Upgrade your tank

increase move speed
increase bullet speed
decrease reload time
add bounce to your shots
reinforce your tank armor
raise your bullet capacity
in co-op mode, choose to revive a fallen ally instead of gaining an upgrade

Survivor Mode

Pick any level unlocked in the campaign to survive as long as you can using any tank. Earn an upgrade at each milestone of enemies defeated. Rising difficulty and number of enemies over time. Saves best time and most enemies defeated for each level. Supports 1 to 4 players.

Battle Mode

Battle your friends in versus mode for 2 to 4 players. Earn a point for each tank you defeat and pick an upgrade when you are defeated. Win by reaching a certain number of points or by having the most points at the end of the timer. Choose the number of points or time to end the match.

Race Mode

Race to four points placed randomly on the map to complete a lap, all while fighting off endless waves of enemies to finish in first. Choose the map, number of laps, and intensity of the enemies. Supports 2 - 4 players.

Clear Missions and Set Records

A list of 36 missions (achievements) is provided for extra challenge. Examples include beating the campaign with special conditions, like using a specific tank or never choosing a specific upgrade. Records of your best campaign time, shots, and damage taken are saved to your records for each tank type. In co-op, each player can go for different missions, making getting all of them faster. Individual records for Survivor, Battle, and Race mode are also included.

name: Rogue Tanks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8400 CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.81 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Blast through random levels of enemies with or against up to 3 of your friends in this action roguelike top-down shooter! Travel from the desert to the enemy base and...into space!? Upgrade with quicker firing, bouncing bullets, and more. Defeat huge bosses to unlock more tank classes!
